description:
Flame Launcher Setup

Flame Launcher Setup File
üöÄ Features
- Import from launcher added
- Skin support on every server
- Linux version added
- Supports the latest Minecraft version
üêõ Bug Fixes & Patches
- Fix some type & fs errors
- Should not login failed due to user not setting skin
- Should allow user to disable community translated content
- Use high-res image for Modrinth
- Correctly show file name in file tree
üèóÔ∏è Refactors
- Adjust some error handling/reporting
- Use GitHub release first for indians
- Allow user to select policy to upgrade mods
- Enable the Modrinth/CurseForge i18n for mods content
- Lazy load the locale file to reduce memory usage
- Remove semaphore in client to reduce memory usage
- Allow modpack instance to repair current instance
